item.title: Talks
item.description: Upcoming talks The National Academies Board on Atmospheric Sciences and Climate will hold a workshop on AI for Earth Sciences Feb 7-11: Laure Zanna will be moderating; Pierre Gentine and Ryan Abernathey will be presenting. More Info The Artificial Intelligence for Good Group - Pierre Gentine will be presenting on March 9th on Can Artificial Intelligence Help Us Better Project Climate Change? Register Past talks Big Data 2021
